title: Ep. 953 - Democrats: Don't Let Nuclear War Distract From Old Hate Crimes
description:
As Putin threatens nuclear winter, Democrats focus on outlawing lynchings from a century ago, Ukraine attempts to join the EU, and one Russia expert says we’re already in World War III.
